name: The legend of the looter
description:
You're on a journey for giving items to the greatest mazes shopkeepers in the lands of Hurama. Use your mechanic-hook-arm and your unlimited-space-backpack to plunder mazes in search for special items.



  • Use W, A, S, D to move the player character.
  • Use the mouse to aim.
  • Click to shot your mechanic-hook-arm and grab objects to put them in your unlimited backpack (it is made of the same materials of Hermione's purple beaded handbag).
  • Right click to throw items from your backpack (use them to hit the skeletons that want their things back, or stun them and put them also in your inventory).
MADE FOR #LDJAM #LD42
